attributes.additional_details: Giving us 3 weeks to cramp 6 months of missing work into if adding more unnecessary stress on young minds. We are already stressed enough about our futures without having to worry about getting all this work done in 3 weeks. We don’t want longer to study we want 6 months worth of content reduced. I personally feel like the government shouldn’t decide what gets reduced they should send every school a selection and the students vote depending on their own strengths and weaknesses.
attributes.background: I want the Government to reduce 6 months worth of the content that we’ve lost due to corona virus, giving us an extra 3 weeks isn’t going to help anybody.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
